NewsArticle.Title: The Red Moon
NewsArticle.Content: The Red Moon has come to haunt the lands of Temuair. Many Deochs ago, a demon sorcerer was vanquished from Temuair. Before his defeat, the sorcerer placed a curse on the lands, the curse of the Red Moon. The Mundanes were worried at first, but after many Deochs, a red moon never appeared. It was assumed that there was no curse and no one ever spoke of it again. But today, a full red moon hovers the sky above Temuair. Legend has it, those who stare at the moon will succumb to its power.
